pageProduct.name: RID Medicated Repellent 50ml Roll On
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

16% DEET effectively repels for up to 4 hours.
Designed to be a before and after bite medication
with antiseptic to reduce inflammation and assist
to prevent infection caused by insect bites.
Chamomile helps soothe the bite to stop the itching.
Vitamin E assist wound healing of broken skin.
Combined with a fly repellent effective against files,gnats, tsetse flies, ants and lice.
Neutral scent from Chamomile.
3 Year Shelf Life.
PETA Friendly, NOT tested on animals medication.
Verified by Independent Laboratory Tests.
Aerosol is CFC Free.
